title: Exosomal circ_0084043 derived from colorectal cancer-associated fibroblasts promotes in vitro endothelial cell angiogenesis by regulating the miR-140–3p/HIF-1α/VEGF signaling axis
content:
Publication date: 15 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 11
